sentences.en: A witness picked him out of an identification parade as the robber.
sentences.cn: 一名目击者将他从辨认队列中指认出来,说他就是抢匪.

sentences.en: Can I see your identification, please ?
sentences.cn: 我能看看您的证件 吗 ?

sentences.en: Car manufacturers stamp a vehicle identification number at several places on new cars to help track down stolen vehicles.
sentences.cn: 汽车制造商在新车的好几处地方打上车辆识别号码，以便于追查被偷车辆。
你有什么身份证明文件吗？

sentences.en: fingerprinting as a means of identification
sentences.cn: 作为一种身份证明方式的指纹提取

sentences.en: He's made a formal identification of the body.
sentences.cn: 他正式确认了死者身份。

sentences.en: His body was taken to Brighton mortuary for identification.
sentences.cn: 他的尸体被送到布赖顿停尸所确认身份。

sentences.en: His identification with the hero of the book made him sleepless.
sentences.cn: 对书中主人公的同情使他睡不着.

sentences.en: Marilyn had an intense identification with animals.
Officials are awaiting positive identification before charging the men with war crimes.
sentences.cn: 在以战争罪起诉这些人以前，官员们一直在等待他们身份的核实。

sentences.en: That scar on your face is a good identification mark.
sentences.cn: 你脸上那块疤是个好记号.

sentences.en: The identification of rabies virus has saved many lives.
sentences.cn: 狂犬病病毒的确认挽救了许多人的性命.

sentences.en: The identification of the crash victims was a long and difficult task.
sentences.cn: 鉴别坠机意外伤亡者的工作费时而且困难重重。

sentences.en: Their work includes the identification of genes which govern the growth rate and fertility.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作包括找出那些控制生长率和繁殖能力的基因。

sentences.en: They took a plaster cast of the teeth for identification purposes.
sentences.cn: 他们做了这副牙的石膏模型作鉴别之用。

sentences.en: We should have identification card on the person when we go out.
sentences.cn: 我们外出时应随身携带身份证.

sentences.en: When officials like gas and electricity men call to read the meter, ask for identification.
sentences.cn: 当有燃气或电力公司的职员来抄表时，要请他们出示身份证件。

sentences.en: Windows are etched with the vehicle identification number.
sentences.cn: 玻璃上刻着车辆识别码。

被识别的；经鉴定的；被认同者
标识符，认同者；检验人，鉴定人
身份；同一性，一致；特性；恒等式
确定；识别；使参与；把…看成一样
鉴定，[计]识别；认同；身份证明

标识号；身份证号码；成套设备编号
美军官兵套在颈上的军籍号码牌
鉴别测验；药物的鉴别试验
目标识别；对象的确认，对象标识；物体识别
[计]个人标识号；个人识别号码

trans.tran_cn: 识别，身份证明，密切关联，认同，同情
trans.tran_en: official papers or cards, such as your passport, that prove who you are
